Highlights:Order HistoryCheck the status on current orders or review past orders with easy-to-access order history.

Updated Order ConfirmationWhen signed in, order confirmations now provide a progress tracker, restaurant location info, order details, method of payment and pricing info. 

Delivery InstructionsAdd delivery instructions at checkout for an even more convenient dine-at-home experience.

Highlights:Order HistoryCheck the status on current orders or review past orders with easy-to-access order history.

Updated Order ConfirmationWhen signed in, order confirmations now provide a progress tracker, restaurant location info, order details, method of payment and pricing info. 

Delivery InstructionsAdd delivery instructions at checkout for an even more convenient dine-at-home experience.

Order History: Check the status on current orders or review past orders with easy-to-access order history.

Updated Order Confirmation: When signed in, order confirmations now provide a progress tracker, restaurant location info, order details, method of payment and pricing info. 

Delivery Instructions: Add delivery instructions at checkout for an even more convenient dine-at-home experience.

Order History: Check the status on current orders or review past orders with easy-to-access order history.

Updated Order Confirmation: When signed in, order confirmations now provide a progress tracker, restaurant location info, order details, method of payment and pricing info. 

Delivery Instructions: Add delivery instructions at checkout for an even more convenient dine-at-home experience.

Various enhancements and minor bug fixes to make your food ordering experience even better. Log in to support your local restaurants.
Various enhancements and minor bug fixes to make your food ordering experience even better. Log in to support your local restaurants.

Our latest updates make it easier to find your favorite restaurants or discover something new. 
- Now you'll see recommended restaurants and cuisines whenever you search. Simply start typing and we'll provide a list of recommendations in the search field. 
- We also fixed some bugs and added overall improvements to make your experience even better.
